channel.title: My Blogs website
channel.description: Recent content on My Blogs website

item.title: Plot with Error Bar
item.description: Introduction This tutorial describes how to create a graph with error bars using R software and ggplot2 package. There are different types of error bars which can be created using the functions below : geom_errorbar(), geom_linerange(), geom_pointrange(), geom_crossbar(), geom_errorbarh() Prepare the data ToothGrowth data is used. It describes the effect of Vitamin C on tooth growth in Guinea pigs. Three dose levels of Vitamin C (0.5, 1, and 2 mg) with each of two delivery methods [orange juice (OJ) or ascorbic acid (VC)] are used :

item.title: Venn Diagram
item.description: Venn Diagram can be created by various Packages: ggven, ggVennDiagram, RAM, and VennDiagram Generate Data # Generate 3 sets of 200 words set1 <- paste(rep("word_" , 200) , sample(c(1:1000) , 200 , replace=F) , sep="") set2 <- paste(rep("word_" , 200) , sample(c(1:1000) , 200 , replace=F) , sep="") set3 <- paste(rep("word_" , 200) , sample(c(1:1000) , 200 , replace=F) , sep="") # List of items x <- list(A=set1, B=set2) # List of items y <- list(A=set1, B=set2, C=set3) names(y) ## [1] "A" "B" "C" 1) Create Venn diagrams using the ggven R package 2D Venn diagram library("ggvenn") ggvenn(y, columns = c("A", "B"),stroke_size = 0.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.

item.title: About
item.description: This is my blogs website, which will include statistical methods and data visualization from some projects I worked before. All data and codes can be downloaded from my Github.
